verbose_text: Flow cytometry analysis of newborn 's microglia for the proliferation marker Ki67 showed that maternal treatment with alphaIFNAR prior to MIA [alphaIFNAR-Poly (I : C)] diminished the negative effect of MIA on microglial proliferation, as compared with the group that was treated with IgG prior to the poly (I : C) [IgG-Poly (I : C); Fig. XREF_FIG].
evidence: alphaIFNAR prior to MIA [alphaIFNAR-Poly(I:C)] diminished the negative effect of MIA
